errors.insecureContextMessage: Try connecting over HTTPS or let the admin know to set up HTTPS. For more information, see {0}.
errors.loadChallenge: Failed to load challenge data. You may want to reload the page.
errors.resolveAlgorithm: Failed to resolve check algorithm. You may want to reload the page.
errors.longVerification: Verification is taking longer than expected. Please do not refresh the page.

dependencies.missingWebCrypto: Your browser doesn't have a functioning web.crypto element. Are you viewing this over a secure context?
dependencies.missingWebWorkers: Your browser doesn't support web workers (Sisyphus uses this to avoid freezing your browser). Do you have a plugin like JShelter installed?

modal.title: Why am I seeing this?
modal.paragraph1: You are seeing this because the administrator of this website has set up {0} to protect the server against the scourge of {1}, which can cause downtime for websites and make their resources inaccessible for everyone.
modal.scrapingWebsite: unrestricted scraping of website content by AI companies
modal.paragraph2: Sisyphus uses a {0} scheme similar to {1}, a proof-of-work system commonly used to reduce email spam. The idea is that the additional load is negligible for individual users but adds up significantly for large-scale scrapers, making scraping much more expensive.
modal.paragraph3: We assure you that this feature is not intended to hinder anything other than large-scale scraping. You can visit {0} to learn more. In the future, we may adopt more user-friendly technologies to achieve similar effects.
modal.paragraph4: Please note that Sisyphus requires modern JavaScript features that plugins like {0} may disable. Please disable JShelter or similar plugins for this domain. If you still cannot browse the website after disabling them, please visit {1} to let us know.
